mapper.insert: insert into DailyPost (user_id, title, content, register_at, updated_at, photourl) values (#{dailyPost.userId}, #{dailyPost.title}, #{dailyPost.content}, #{dailyPost.registerAt}, #{dailyPost.updatedAt}, #{dailyPost.photourl})
mapper.select: select dp.id as daily_post_id, user_id, nickname as nick_name, title, content, register_at, updated_at, likecount, commentcount from dailypost dp left outer join (select count(id) as likecount, daily_post_id from likedaily group by daily_post_id) dp2 on dp.id = dp2.daily_post_id left outer join (select count(id) as commentcount, daily_post_id from comment group by daily_post_id) dp3 on dp.id = dp3.daily_post_id inner join user on dp.user_id = user.id

select dp.id as daily_post_id, user_id, nickname as nick_name, title, content, register_at, updated_at, likecount, commentcount from dailypost dp left outer join (select count(id) as likecount, daily_post_id from likedaily group by daily_post_id) dp2 on dp.id = dp2.daily_post_id left outer join (select count(id) as commentcount, daily_post_id from comment group by daily_post_id) dp3 on dp.id = dp3.daily_post_id inner join user on dp.user_id = user.id where dp.id = #{id};
